definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: But the agitation seems more intense than in the pre-Internet days.
sentences.chinese: 但这种焦虑不安似乎比前互联网时代更剧烈。

sentences.english: Don't get chewed up about the new law;it won't affect you.
sentences.chinese: 别为新法律焦虑不安，它不会影响你的。

sentences.english: The incident left him unstrung and incapable of rational effort.
sentences.chinese: 这一事变让他焦虑不安，不能采取理智的措施。

sentences.english: He was stewing up her safety as she didn't come back at midnight.
sentences.chinese: 他感到焦虑不安，这么晚了她还没有回来。

sentences.english: How can we make it up to them for all the worry we've caused them?
sentences.chinese: 我们害得他们如此焦虑不安，要怎样才能弥补呢？

sentences.english: Before the period of anxiety, emotional short-tempered.
sentences.chinese: 经期前情绪焦虑不安，容易发脾气。

sentences.english: Mrs. Rumbold is all in a flutter about her daughter's wedding next week.
sentences.chinese: 鲁姆伯特太太为女儿下周的婚礼感到焦虑不安。

sentences.english: She looks around worriedly for her father.
sentences.chinese: 她焦虑不安地四处张望寻找她爸爸。

definition: lit. heart distracted, thoughts in turmoil (idiom); distraught with anxiety
to be on tenterhooks (idiom)/to be anxious and frightened
to worry about personal gains and losses
deeply worried and sick at heart (idiom)
anxious and perplexed/uneasy and confused/suspicious and fearful
